dcterms:creator: W.-J. Yan
X. Li
S.-J. Wang
G. Zhao
Y.-J. Liu
Y.-H. Chen
X. Fu
dcterms:description: The SMIC database is the first database containing spontaneous micro-expressions obtained through an emotion elicitation experiment. It includes a total of 164 micro-expression clips from 16 participants, categorized into three types of expressions based on participants' subjective emotions.
dcterms:title: SMIC

dcterms:creator: A. K. Davison
C. Lansley
N. Costen
K. Tan
M. H. Yap
dcterms:description: CASME II is an improved version of the CASME database with a higher frame rate and resolution. It contains 255 micro-expression clips from 26 subjects, classified into seven categories based on facial action units and self-reports.
dcterms:title: CASMEII

dcterms:creator: J. See
M. H. Yap
J. Li
X. Hong
S. J. Wang
dcterms:description: SAMM contains a total of 159 micro-expression sequences from 32 participants, classified into seven basic expression categories based on FACS. It provides onset frames, apex frames, and AU labels for expression clips.
dcterms:title: SAMM

dcterms:creator: X. Li
T. Pfister
X. Huang
G. Zhao
M. Pietikainen
dcterms:description: The combined database includes 442 micro-expression samples from three datasets (SMIC, CASMEII, and SAMM), reclassified into three categories: positive, negative, and surprise.
dcterms:title: Combined database
